title: Client Engagements
text: Provided high levels of service to clients satisfaction; built client confidence

title: Technical Abilities
text: Possessed technical skills and abilities relevant to business; exhibited technical achievement and technical leadership

title: Consulting Skills
text: Demonstrated written and verbal communication skills and listening skills; was adaptable; handled pressure; shared information and ideas; built strong relationships; recognized opportunities

title: Professionalism
text: Took initiative and maintained a positive outlook; was dependable; committed to career and dedicated to excellence; maintained high personal standards

title: Leadership
text: Made sound judgments and provided clear direction; instilled confidence in others; was consistently successful; worked to build consensus

title: Teamwork
text: Actions and decisions considered the team before self; showed ability to cooperate; committed to Perficient

title: Business Development
text: Colleague is appropriately involved in business development efforts given their level in the company.  List supported BD efforts in comments.

title: Career Counseling
text: Colleague is an active participant in the Uplink program, demonstrated by on-time and thorough career documentation.  If the colleague is above a Lead, colleague also participates as a counselor.

title: Recruiting Assistance
text: Colleague assists with phone interviews and on-site interviews in support of the recruiting process

title: Internal Contributions
text: Colleague contributes to the development of the business unit through knowledge sharing, culture contributions, or internal projects.

title: Perficient Basics
text: Time Reporting and Expense Reporting is on time and error-free; Resume is current and posted in the Resume Repository; colleague has been well-prepared for client interviews
